meanings.definition: A hallucinogenic compound found in certain types of mushrooms.
meanings.sent1: The psilocybin in those mushrooms can cause hallucinations.
meanings.sent2: Magic mushrooms contain psilocybin, which can alter perception.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally ate psilocybin mushrooms and thought I could talk to animals!
meanings.sent4: Her mind soared like a bird after consuming psilocybin.
meanings.sent5: The effects of psilocybin on the brain are truly fascinating.

meanings.definition: The psychoactive ingredient in magic mushrooms.
meanings.sent1: Psilocybin is what makes magic mushrooms have their effects.
meanings.sent2: People seek out psilocybin for its mind-altering properties.
meanings.sent3: The gnome in the garden offered me a plate of psilocybin-laced mushrooms!
meanings.sent4: His thoughts danced like fireflies under the influence of psilocybin.
meanings.sent5: The experience of ingesting psilocybin can be both enlightening and intense.
